content.text: In every gas station, store, or restaurant you see, you can observe that their signs are much higher than the rest and can be seen for a mile away. These signs are called pole signs because the sign is installed on top of a tall pole.
Pole signs are the best type of signs a business can use because not only do they let people know that you are in the area, they also tell people that you are open and ready to assist.

Royal Signs & Awnings is the best in pole sign design, manufacturing, and installation in Houston, TX. Our team has a fast and accommodating customer support and a talented team of fabricators and installers.
Call Royal Signs & Awnings today at (281) 645-9935 for a Free Consultation with a Pole Sign Expert!
Illuminated or lighted pole signs are special pole signs that can be lit open late at night. They are usually 20 feet and up, allowing travelers to see your business from a mile away.

Aside from illuminated pole signs, we can also do pylon and tenant signs that are higher than your business building. These types of signs are made from heavier materials with a wider support structure.
